name: aries-akrida
description: The Aries Akrida is designed to load test various Hyperledger Aries deployments

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -s -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version --no-git-tag-version major && cd load-agent && npm version --no-git-tag-version major
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -s -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version --no-git-tag-version minor && cd load-agent && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -s -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && cd load-agent && npm version --no-git-tag-version patch
